New Records: Shadab Khan hit the second-fastest fifty by a Pakistan batter in T20I history, achieving this in 20 balls
Key Match Events: South Africa were 16 runs behind the DLS par score after 9 overs
Shadab Khan picked up two crucial wickets of Temba Bavuma and Aiden Markram in the same over
Pre-Game Insights: The match was highly anticipated as South Africa were in a strong position in the Super 12 points table and Pakistan needed a win to keep their tournament hopes alive
Miscellaneous Highlights: The DLS target calculations were a key factor in the match progression
South Africa had previously been affected by rain in another match in the tournament
